com.here.android.mpa.search

Class Ratings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Ratings

  • public class Ratings
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a summary of user-supplied ratings for a Place.

    Note: ratings are normalized to values from [0..5], to compensate for potential differences between supplier ratings systems.

    See Also:
    Place.getUserRatings()
